question: For the reaction <katex>$PCl_{5} \rightarrow PCl_{3}+Cl_{2}$</katex>, rate and rate constant are <katex>$1.02 \times 10^{-4} \ mol \ L^{-1} s^{-1}$</katex> and <katex>$3.4 \times 10^{-5} s^{-1}$</katex> respectively at a given instant. The molar concentration of <katex>$PCl_{5}$</katex> at that instant is:
